reviews.review:
Portal 2 is the best thinking game I ever played.
It contains brilliant puzzels and a wonderful humor.
Belive me you wont forget the jokes-NEVER!!!
Epic game!

Not the perfectly-paced morsel that the original is, but certainly an expertly-prepared feast. In particular, the co-op is entirely unique and my personal favourite thing about it. No trouble recommending it.

Bellissimo!!!...e divertentissimo con un amico!
Il piu bel gioco coop mai realizzato :)

MASTER PIECE. Absolutely a MUST. I didn't enjoy a game like this one for a very long time. Puzzles are (if you recently played it) easer than in Portal 1 (even that I was really stuck in three of them) but, everything is more variated and original. Dialogs are funny, sometimes you feel yourself like beeing inside a Pixar's film. Music is awesome (don't miss the ending piece). A very pleasant experience. If you are fed up of killing zombies or whatever else boring game, you deserve yourself a good time. Buy this joy inmediately!
Unfortunatelly, all this kind of amazing games feel as short but, fortunatelly, this one has a cooperative bi-player option (still not experienced).
Großartiges Spiel!!! Sowie im Coop als auch im Singleplayer sehr anspruchsvoll... Kaufempfehlung

Genius level story telling meets great puzzles and there's your another blockbuster Valve game.
One of the best games I've ever played! So, don't hesitate purchasing it. Just be sure you played the first one...

Really good game, I think the storyline in portal 2 is better than in portal 1 and co-op just gives the game that extra touch that the first was missing. 

A must buy!
Oustanding in every way. Play this game. You will not be sorry.
The best sequel to a game ever. if you buy anything on steam it should be this!

Mediocre. You're better off playing Portal 1 and forget about this. If you've never played Portal you WILL not understand why people enjoy Portal, but you'll think it's supposed to be good because everyone else says so. Not bad for $5 or less.

BEST GAME EVER...the co-op mode is FANTASTIC

5/5
(cake)

A MUST buy at the $15 price this week, especially now that you get the free DLC pack with it. On release was priced a bit much since the campaigns were a bit short, now with the extra content its definitely worth it! Its an awesome game with an awesome single player and awesome co-op campaigns that are each unique. I love the story line and gameplay. If life hands you lemons, MAKE LEMONADE!

Portal 2 takes the puzzle-solving formula of the original and expands upon it, whilst filling it out to make a full stand-alone game. There's a fantastic story well told with interesting characters and great set-pieces.

The story is engaging, the sound design astounding (particularly the music), you'll want to push on to see the next twist in the plot, the next interaction with the games cast of off-beat characters. The voice acting and animation of these characters really bring some life to the corridors of Aperture Science.

Some may be put off by the 'puzzle' element, and although that is a key part of the game, it's blended in so well you don't notice as the game changes foot from action to puzzles to story and back again; these elements each encroach upon each other, sometimes at unexpected moments. The game is well designed and balanced, unobtrusively teaching you all you need to progress, leaving you feeling like a genius.

How do you describe Portal 2? Its like a puzzle game shooter hybrid. The voice acting of Steve Merchant was a huge bonus for me personaly and only takes the already snarky good humor, over the top. Very easy learing curve for people who havint played Portal. 9/10
A truly remarkable game, definitely better than the first installment with the adition of multiplayer coop and a longer campaign.One of the best games ever made and a personal favorite. 10/10

ce jeu est plus qu'énorme, qu'attendez-vous? ^^
Fantastic game.  Witty humor, good puzzle setups.  Co-op is fun, challenging, and continues with Portal's unique GlaDoS narration.  Well worth it in my opinion.

Гениальная игра с уникальным геймплеем. О Portal2 можно говорить часами. Линейный сюжет можно проходить по нескольку раз и всё равно поучать огромное удовольствие. Реплики Глэдос можно разбирать на цитаты. Всё же очень жаль что Valve не умеет считать до 3.

This game is like P90X for casual gamers. No mindless puzzle solving, you'll actually have to use your mind and check out your surroundings first. With a coop mode included, what more could you ask for?

Portal 2 is clearly the best game ever made and more than deserves all its praise and the hype surrounding it doesn't even justify its glory. It features incredibly challenging puzzles and endless replayability for the most refined and enjoyable experience of this or any other generation. I'm going to name my firstborn child GLaDOS. Yeah, the kid will have a fucked up life but you know what? This game is that fucking good.

Compared to Portal 1, it's almost double the length, and features online co-op. The story is just as hilarious and engrossing as ever. The longer length, in my opinion, gets to be a bit unbearable towards the end. I found myself just wanting to know the rest of the story, but the puzzles kept coming and I got frustrated. It's considerably more challenging than the original, but not nearly as open ended in the ways you can solve the puzzles. Has very little replay value, other than if you want to try to piece the story together more. Online co-op is practically empty now.
